#include<bits/stdc++.h>

using namespace std;

int last(int val)
{
    int sum=0;
    while(val)
    {
        if((val%10)%2 == 0)
            sum = sum + (val%10)*2;
        else
            sum = sum + (val%10);
            val = val/10;
    }
    //cout<<"last "<<sum%10<<endl;
    return sum%10;
}

int sum(int val)
{
    int res=0;
    while(val%10)
    {
        res = res + last(--val);
        //val--;
    }
    return res + 45*(val/10);
}

int main()
{
    int cases;
    int a,b,sum1,sum2;
    cin>>cases;
    while(cases--)
    {
        cin>>a>>b;
        sum1 = sum(b+1);
      //  cout<<"sum1 "<<sum1<<endl;
        sum2 = sum(a);
        //cout<<"sum2 "<<sum2<<endl;
        cout<<sum1-sum2<<endl;
    }
    return 0;
}
